DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether electroacupuncture effective treatment overactive bladder .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment , Parallel Assignment , Double Blind ( Subject , Outcomes Assessor ) , Efficacy Study
DOC.detailed_description: Patient registry : Participants experience overactive bladder recruit hospital outpatient clinic-community . diagnosis make urologist . random number table generate Computer . Sample size : According preliminary experiment combine literature . Sample size base primary outcome . The first step : one-tailed test : electroacupuncture group vs Solifenacin group 79.5 % VS 54.8 % ( α=0.05 , β=0.20 , n=51 ) . The second step : two-tailed test : electroacupuncture group vs Placebo group 54.5 % VS 20.9 % , ( α=0.05 , β=0.20 , n=37 ) . To combine first second step , 51 case group need . Allowing 10 % dropout , 57 case group need . So set sample size 60 . Quality control 1 . Strict train staff participate trial . 2 . Rigorous control process randomization . 3 . Specific inclusion exclusion criterion . 4 . Strict outcome assessor statistician . 5 . The standard drug , acupuncture apparatus , inspection equipment consistant . 6 . Outcome assessment , completion case report form data management strict supervision .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Clinical diagnosis overactive bladder . 2 . Frequent micturition.（average urinary frequency ≥8 void per day） 3 . No relevant drug use within 2 week acupuncture treatment within 1 month study ; clinical trial . 4 . Selfreported bladder symptom ≥3 month 5 . Capable give informed consent . 6 . Capable willing follow studyrelated procedure Frequent micturition urinary urgency secondary disease . Clinical diagnosis simple stress urinary incontinence . Patients urinary track infection vagenal infection . Patients implantable pelvic stimulator . Current use electric therapy pelvic area/back/legs . Current use clostridium botulinum therapy vesical pelvic muscle . participation clinical inverstigation involve impact gynecological/urinary/renal function . Suffering severe cardiac/hepatic/renal injury cognitive disorder/aphasia/ dysphrenia/malnutrition , poor perform status unable cooperate . Patients gestation lactation period . Patients coagulation disorder take anticoagulation drug . People cardiac pacemaker metal allergy . Patients get eletroacupunture therapy solifenacin 4 week study . Patients afraid needle .
